ygData.subject: Re: LOC - (enchantment of light spell??)
ygData.msgSnippet: I have new Information on this enchantment of light spell: Yesterday evening a friend of mine petitioned for that spell, the GM Solist on Solusek Ro answerd
ygData.messageBody:
I have new Information on this enchantment of light spell:
Yesterday evening a friend of mine petitioned for that spell, the GM Solist
on Solusek Ro answerd the request and told him that the spell is IN the game
and can be bought from a merchant.

So guys get up, make a roundtrip checking all the merchants near to you, and
presumably someone will come up with the location. If its new in the game,
thats what it is likely from the information, it maybe also with the common
spelldealers.

We checked Neriak yesterday, but couldn't lay hand on it.

Niniel,
lvl 10 darkelf enchantress on Solusek Ro

-----Urspr∩┐╜ngliche Nachricht-----

>From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
>
>I hear that it isn't in the game yet. If someone has info
>to the contrary, there are a LOT of enchanters who
>would love to get their hands on this spell...
